disclaimer.accept_risk: You acknowledge and agree that the use of {appName} is at your own sole risk, and we disclaim any liability for losses or damages related to the use of the Service.
disclaimer.data: Any data and information are provided "as is" for purely informational and educational purposes.

message.erase_all_content_and_settings_explanati: This action will permanently delete all data from this app, including your personal settings, preferences, and saved information. This process is irreversible.

note.appearance: Personalize your experience by selecting a theme that suits your style.
note.change_later: Note that you can always change it later.
note.restart_required: Restart the app for the changes to take effect.
note.settings: Enhance your experience by adjusting your preferences.

question.do_you_enjoy_our_app: If you find our app useful, would you be willing to take a few moments to rate it?
question.erase_all_content_and_settings: Are you sure you want to erase all content and settings?

select.language: Select the language you would like to use.
